segments.text: The kitchen feels alive with the hustle of everyday life, yet so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman so engrossed in her task, completely missing the bigger picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is almost admirable, really, but it’s misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of water splashing catches my attention, and I frown.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I picture the mess that will ensue if she ever realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is bravely perched on that rickety stool, and I can hardly watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement is palpable; he’s so close to victory.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at what cost? The potential for disaster looms large.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful expression makes my heart ache a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All she wants is a cookie, but I dread what might happen first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside looks so inviting compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to pull them back into the safety of that peaceful view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene, so routine for the woman, is a ticking time bomb for the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s unsettling to think how easily things can go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why won’t she just turn around and see what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR
